subject: Steroids
Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The House committee investigating steroids in baseball has postponed its hearing to Feb. 13, making it a major distraction at the start of camp for Andy Pettitte and the Yankees.
snippet: The House committee investigating steroids in baseball has postponed its hearing to Feb. 13, making it a major distraction at the start of camp for Andy Pettitte and the Yankees.
